name: Punta del Este Flight School
about: Punta del Este Flight School, established in 2010, is the first Civil Aviation Training Center (CIAC) certified by the Civil Aviation Authority in Uruguay, specifically by the Dirección Nacional de Aviación Civil (DINACIA). We are committed to providing high-quality aviation training, adhering to national and international standards. Our programs include Private Pilot Licence (PPL), Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), and Instrument Rating. Our goal is to be a regional and international reference training center, offering a productive and enriching learning experience. Our students have successfully integrated into the aeronautical industry, with many praising the school for its supportive and knowledgeable instructors. We strive to make every student's experience excellent and productive.
services:
["Commercial Instrument Pilot
Cabin Crew
Drone pilot – RPAS- DRONE operator
Flight Operations Officer
Private Pilot
Safety Management System – SMS
Ramp operator and airfield signalman"]
